Entries.Wedding_Juliet: sweet/-1000 -1000/farmer 26 63 1 Juliet 27 63 3 Gremlin 26 71 0 LadySheba 26 56 1 Jasper 30 66 0 Beatrice 30 65 0 CorwinLK 31 65 0 EdithHart 24 65 0 Eloise 25 66 0 EthanHart 25 65 0 Jacob 24 66 0 Jade 29 67 0 Jessie 25 70 0 Aideen 28 66 0 MichaelHart 23 65 0 Rosa 29 66 0 StellaHart 22 65 0 {{ESWeddingGuests}} Sam 28 65 0 Shane 29 65 0 Nova.Dylan? 28 68 0 Nova.Eli? 29 68 0 Nora? 31 67 0 Fievel? 31 68 0 RodneyOBrien? 30 68 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren? 22 69 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd? 22 68 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gunnar? 24 68 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 23 68 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun 25 68 0 KatarynaLK 31 66 0/changeToTemporaryMap EastScarp_Village_Wedding/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Mateo? 28 69/faceDirection Jade 0/showFrame Juliet 37/changeSprite Jessie Celebrant/viewport 26 64 true/globalFadeToClear/advancedMove Gremlin false 0 -7 4 10/proceedPosition Gremlin/showFrame Juliet 36/emote Juliet 20/pause 500/advancedMove Gremlin false 2 0 0 -1 3 100/showFrame Juliet 37/advancedMove Jessie false 1 0 0 -6 4 100/proceedPosition Jessie/pause 500/emote Jessie 40/showFrame Gremlin 28/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame Juliet 36/emote Juliet 32 true/pause 100/emote farmer 32 true/pause 600/faceDirection Jessie 2/pause 500/speak Jessie "Welcome, everyone. And thank you for joining us today, as we celebrate the union of two of our beloved villagers.$6"/pause 500/faceDirection Jessie 0/speak Jessie "@, who may not live in the Scarp, but whom, I think we can all agree, has been an honest and true friend....$6"/pause 500/emote Jessie 20 true/pause 500/emote Fievel? 32 true/emote SenS? 20 true/pause 500/emote ToriLK 32 true/pause 750/emote EdithHart 32 true/pause 500/speak Jessie "... and Juliet, who came to... in her words: 'kick ass and cause trouble' and found love along the way!$7"/pause 500/emote Juliet 60/pause 500/emote Jessie 20 true/pause 500/emote Rosa 32 true/pause 500/emote Jacob 32 true/pause 300/showFrame Juliet 37/pause 200/textAboveHead Juliet "Let's do this!"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/emote farmer 56/advancedMove Jessie false 0 1 4 100/proceedPosition Jessie/emote Jessie 40/speak Jessie "By the power vested in me, and by the strength of your love and dedication to one another, I now pronounce you, married!$6#$b#You may kiss.$7"/pause 500/textAboveHead Juliet "Hell yeah!"/pause 500/faceDirection Jessie 2/pause 500/positionOffset Juliet -16 0/showFrame farmer 101/showFrame Juliet 38/specificTemporarySprite heart 21 106/pause 500/emote Jade 20/pause 1500/playSound dwop/pause 2000/advancedMove LadySheba false 3 0 0 2 2 100/specificTemporarySprite wed/positionOffset Juliet 16 0/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame Juliet 36/faceDirection MichaelHart 1 true/faceDirection EdithHart 3 true/faceDirection Jade 1/faceDirection ToriLK 3/advancedMove Jessie false 0 3 4 100/pause 4000/faceDirection farmer 1/showFrame Juliet 37/pause 500/proceedPosition LadySheba/playSound cat/faceDirection Gremlin 0/pause 500/playSound dog_bark/emote LadySheba 16/speed LadySheba 5/speed Gremlin 4/advancedMove LadySheba false 0 -5 -10 0/pause 1000/advancedMove Gremlin false 0 -5 1 0 0 -5 3 100/pause 5000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "[LocalizedText Strings\StringsFromCSFiles:Utility.cs.5381]"/pause 500/message "[LocalizedText Strings\StringsFromCSFiles:Utility.cs.5383]"/pause 4000/waitForOtherPlayers weddingEnd[FarmerUniqueId]/viewport move 0 -1 6000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
